summary: Simple utility for comparing INI files.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Simple INI Comparer v0.1[/color][/b]

This is a tiny utility that I quickly put together to be able to conveniently compare INI files (I needed it mainly for comparing enblocal.ini files). There are probably similar utilities available but honestly I couldn't find a tool I needed.

The application is self-explaining so it doesn't really need instructions, but basically:

1. Drag and drop first INI file on the turquoise area (or click the area to open file browser)
2. Drag and drop second INI file on the salmon area (or click the area to open file browser)
3. Click Compare
4. ?
5. Profit - both INI files are shown side by side. INI file sections are displayed on top - click them to show a specific section.
6. Optionally - click turquoise/salmon area to edit specific file.

Hope it helps someone - I know scanning INI files can be tedious.

[color=yellow]Requirements: .NET Framework 3.5[/color]

[color=yellow]Update 0.2:[/color]
- increased font size
- text is now read only - to edit file, click its name
- colorized file differences: different parameter values (dark background) and parameters existing only in one of the files (yellow background)

[color=yellow]Update 0.3:[/color]
- minor update - after browsing for files it was impossible to compare them - fixed
author: baal1980
